title: Borat Podcast Episode: US of A Legal Learnings for Make Benefit People Who Sign Contracts Without Reading Them
description:
“Wawaweewa” is what Sacha Baron Cohen is saying after fending off multiple lawsuits over his Borat films. “Borat” has never lost a case even though his participants are usually embarrassed and upset about the way they were portrayed in his films. How does Borat get away with it?? Tune in as we break down Borat’s biggest lawsuits and how Sacha wiggles out of them EVERY TIME.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
